description: Nushell development hooks for validation and auto-formatting

PreToolUse.description: CLI-based pre-write validation using nu-lint and nufmt

PostToolUse.description: Comprehensive post-write validation orchestrating syntax, lint, format, and IDE checks

SessionStart.description: Detect available Nushell validation tools (nu-lint, nufmt, nu --ide-check)

hooks.command: nu -c 'let tools = [[tool available]; [nu-lint (which nu-lint | is-not-empty)] [nufmt (which nufmt | is-not-empty)] [nu-ide-check true]]; print "Nushell validation tools:"; $tools | to text'
